TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi BindingCollectionEnumerator extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IEnumerator

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")

summary.span: Supports a simple iteration over a binding collection in an application upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.

span.span: Supports a simple iteration over a binding collection in an application upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當應用程式升級為[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]、`BindingCollectionEnumerator`是用來啟用`ADO`-相關程式碼。When an application is upgraded to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], a `BindingCollectionEnumerator` is created to enable the `ADO`-related code. > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 來升級[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 在大部分情況下，這些函式和物件會複製您可以在其他命名空間中找到的功能[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 會需要這些只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與大幅[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]實作。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Current As Object
public: property System::Object ^ Current { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the current element in the binding collection.

span.span: Gets the current element in the binding collection.
The current element in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當應用程式升級為[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]、`BindingCollectionEnumerator`是用來啟用`ADO`-相關程式碼。When an application is upgraded to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], a `BindingCollectionEnumerator` is created to enable the `ADO`-related code. > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 來升級[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 在大部分情況下，這些函式和物件會複製您可以在其他命名空間中找到的功能[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 會需要這些只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與大幅[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]實作。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public newslot virtual instance bool MoveNext() cil managed

summary.span: Advances the enumerator to the next element of the collection.

span.span: Advances the enumerator to the next element of the collection.

returns.span: if the enumerator was successfully advanced to the next element; if the enumerator has passed the end of the collection.

span.span: if the enumerator was successfully advanced to the next element; if the enumerator has passed the end of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當應用程式升級為[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]、`BindingCollectionEnumerator`是用來啟用`ADO`-相關程式碼。When an application is upgraded to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], a `BindingCollectionEnumerator` is created to enable the `ADO`-related code. > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 來升級[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 在大部分情況下，這些函式和物件會複製您可以在其他命名空間中找到的功能[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 會需要這些只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與大幅[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]實作。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public newslot virtual instance void Reset() cil managed

summary.span: Sets the enumerator to its initial position, which is before the first element in the collection.

span.span: Sets the enumerator to its initial position, which is before the first element in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當應用程式升級為[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]、`BindingCollectionEnumerator`是用來啟用`ADO`-相關程式碼。When an application is upgraded to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], a `BindingCollectionEnumerator` is created to enable the `ADO`-related code. > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 來升級[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 在大部分情況下，這些函式和物件會複製您可以在其他命名空間中找到的功能[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 會需要這些只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與大幅[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]實作。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
